Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-9648 affecting package ceph for versions less than 16.2.10-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-9648 affecting package ceph for versions less than 16.2.10-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package ceph is earlier than 16.2.10-10, affected by CVE-2025-9648
